solution_line_template: First find the total amount of time Dan spends digging adult graves: {time_per_adult_grave} hours/grave * {num_adult_graves} graves = <<{time_per_adult_grave}*{num_adult_graves}={total_time_adult_graves}>>{total_time_adult_graves} hours

Then add the time to dig the child's grave to find the total time he spends digging: {total_time_adult_graves} hours + {time_per_child_grave} hours = <<{total_time_adult_graves}+{time_per_child_grave}={total_time}>>{total_time} hours
